name: Ensure weak TLS Protocols are not used for ELB
body: Remove insecure ciphers for your ELB Predefined or Custom Security Policy, to reduce the risk of the SSL connection between the client and the load balancer being exploited.
remediationDescription: Follow the steps described in the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/latest/application/listener-update-certificates.html#update-security-policy) on how to update the security policy of a load balancer. Choose a security policy that does not allow SSL 3.0 and/or TLS 1.0, which are known weak ciphers.
